column4: Hi, don't know if this is the right place to say but, I have a 11.04 mythbuntu install, set to auto login. I have an emachine er1402 and when I suspend and then resume the screen is grabled, if I ssh in to the machine and sudo killall Xorg and then login, I can suspend and resume ok until the next reboot. Any suggestions? Thanks
the computer may not properly support suspend
it works ok if I kill Xorg the first time it fails
if i disable auto login it works fine. Need it to auto login as it will not have the keyboard attached
